import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Card, Button, Table, Modal, Space, Form, Input, Col, Row, Radio, message ,Icon} from 'antd' const columns = [ { title: '编号', dataIndex: 'carriageNumber', key: '1', align: 'center', }, { title: '级别', dataIndex: 'level', key: '2', align: 'center', }, { title: '规格', dataIndex: 'size', key: '3', align: 'center', }, { title: '座位数', key: '4', dataIndex: 'seatNumber', align: 'center', }, { title: '价格基数', key: '5', dataIndex: 'priceBase', align: 'center', }, { title: '适配车型', key: '6', dataIndex: 'adapter', align: 'center', }, { title: '操作', key: '7', render: () => ( {console.log(this)} 编辑 删除 ), align: 'center' }, ]; const data = [ { key: '1', carriageNumber: '001', level: '豪华', size: '(4+4)*10', seatNumber: '20', priceBase: '8', adapter: '动车', }, ] const showEidtModal = () => { } export default class Carriage extends Component { state = { addVisible: false, editVisible: false, seatCount: 0, } // 打开新增模态窗口 showAddModal = () => { this.setState({ addVisible: true }) } // 处理点击确定 handleOk = () => { this.setState({ addVisible: false, seatCount: 0 }) } // 处理点击取消 handleCancel = () => { this.setState({ addVisible: false, seatCount: 0 }) } getSizeLeft = (value) => { console.log(value) } // 输入完规格计算座位数 handleBlur = () => { const left = this.leftInput.props.value * 1 const right = this.rightInput.props.value * 1 const row = this.rowInput.props.value if (isNaN(left) || isNaN(right) || isNaN(row)) return const seatCount = (left + right) * row this.setState({ seatCount }) } // 表单提交 onFinish = (values) => { console.log(values) message.success("添加成功") this.setState({ addVisible: false, seatCount: 0 }) } render() { const { seatCount, addVisible, editVisible } = this.state return (
